Class Planet

java.lang.Object
Planet
Direct Known Subclasses:
Asteroid, Moon, Sun
public class Planet extends Object
The Planet class represents a planet in the solar system.

      Constructs a new Planet object.
      Parameters:

      angle - The angle of the planet.
      diameter - The diameter of the planet.
      color - The color of the planet.
      solarSystem - The solar system the planet belongs to.
